message.body: Does the coop have investable oregano oil? I started feeling sick again tonight and am hoping its just from excess garlic or something but I'm nervous about parasites and looking it up in healing with whole foods!
Oh no! Yes we have the liq herbal extract in herbal supp section. Nature's answer is the brand
Ok thanks. Paul also recommends chaparro armagosa which seems hard to find. And he says its for acute so maybe it doesn't apply to me?
